DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Baseline  Vitamin D Level Stratification Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Classifying patients according to their baseline level of Vitamin D (A family of lipo-soluble steroids important to the absorption, metabolism, and function of calcium and phosphorus and the growth and development of bone and tooth enamel. Found naturally in animal tissues, cholecalciferol (vitamin D3) is formed in the skin when ultraviolet light activates cholesterol conversion into vitamin D3) to assure equal balance of these patients before randomization to the intervention arms of a clinical protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Baseline  Vitamin D Stratification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Classifying patients according to their baseline level of Vitamin D (A family of lipo-soluble steroids important to the absorption, metabolism, and function of calcium and phosphorus and the growth and development of bone and tooth enamel. Found naturally in animal tissues, cholecalciferol (vitamin D3) is formed in the skin when ultraviolet light activates cholesterol conversion into vitamin D3) to assure equal balance of these patients before randomization to the intervention arms of a clinical protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredDefinition: Baseline; an imaginary standard by which things are measured or compared.:Vitamin D. The vitamin that mediates intestinal calcium absorption, bone calcium metabolism, and probably muscle activity. It usually acts as a hormone precursor, requiring 2 stages of metabolism before reaching actual hormonal form. It is isolated from fish liver oils and used in the treatment and prevention of rickets.:The process of classifying patients into strata as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.

A family of lipo-soluble steroids important to the absorption, metabolism, and function of calcium and phosphorus and the growth and development of bone and tooth enamel. Found naturally in animal tissues, cholecalciferol (vitamin D3) is formed in the skin when ultraviolet light activates cholesterol conversion into vitamin D3. Ultraviolet irradiation of ergosterol (plant vitamin D) forms ergocalciferol (vitamin D2). (NCI04)
The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.origin: CALGB CRF:Cancer and Leukemia Group B Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount of a group of organic food substances supplied in diet or dietary supplement essential for normal metabolism.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.

Concepts.definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.

Concepts.definition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.
